h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
content: Head along the path to the right to reach the Valley of Blooms Shrine. As with previous Secret Areas, this one has its own separate shop where you can purchase things not found in the rest of the Webbed Hollow, which can help you toward crafting better weapons and armor:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Blooms'.
The content is as follows:
Head along the path to the right to reach the Valley of Blooms Shrine. As with previous Secret Areas, this one has its own separate shop where you can purchase things not found in the rest of the Webbed Hollow, which can help you toward crafting better weapons and armor:
